messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE ID: Alpha-978 DATE: 12/24/38  Emerald Hotel, a prestigious location known to host international dignitaries, received a bomb threat early this morning. The anonymous tip hinted at a planned attack later this evening.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  CASE SUPERVISOR: Captain V. W. Brown is coordinating all operations, ensuring the safety of the hotel's guests and staff. BOMB SQUAD: Detectives X. Y. Fisher and Z. A. Greene have been deployed to survey and secure the hotel's premises. INTELLIGENCE: Detectives B. C. Harris and D. E. Watson are working on tracing the origin of the threat and identifying potential suspects. PATROL: Patrol Officers F. G. Reed, H. I. Lopez, and J. K. Mitchell are managing the evacuation and perimeter security, ensuring no unauthorized access. COMMUNICATION: Lieutenant L. M. Murphy is handling media and public relations, ensuring that the situation remains calm and no panic ensues. ADDITIONAL DETAILS:  The President of Elbonia is currently staying at the Emerald Hotel, making this threat a matter of international concern.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
